q: these problems are correctable, Garcia insists. And time is on all these dogs' side.`` Some say if a dog is bred to do something, you can't undo that,'' Garcia said. But to me, that's like saying if everyone in your family has always fought in a war, you're a warrior and you're destined to do this. Not true. Everyone's an individual. You can choose your own path in life. Same with dogs. The only difference is, they can't choose it. Detroit played without Rip Hamilton ( groin) and Antonio McDyess ( ribs), and lost Rasheed Wallace to a first-half foot injury, but still held the Nets to a season low. No one was going to come in and be Rasheed Wallace , Rip Hamilton or Dice, but we have guys who will come off the bench and help us in their own way, Allen Iverson said.`` We just had to utilize that, even when it meant playing a totally different style.'' Within minutes of his decision being made public, the Washington-based Planned Parenthood Action Fund put out a statement criticizing the staunchly anti-abortion Mike Pence . As women voters in Indiana learn that one of Rep. Mike Pence 's top legislative priorities is effectively denying access to preventive care for millions of women, he will have difficulty winning their vote, Cecile Richards , the fund's president, said in a statement.
